heading: HR01842
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT A PRELIMINARY INVESTIGATION CONFIRMING THE VERACITY OF THE REPORTS OF THE INSTALLATION OF SURFACE-TO-AIR AND ANTI-SHIP CRUISE MISSILES ON KAGITINGAN REEF (FIERY CROSS), ZAMORA REEF (SUBI), AND PANGANIBAN REEF (MISCHIEF) IN THE SPRATLY ISLANDS CHAIN IN THE SOUTH CHINA SEA AND IF PROVEN TRUE CONDEMN IT IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS
status: Pending with the Committee on NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY since 2018-05-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01842
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE HOUSE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT A PRELIMINARY INVESTIGATION CONFIRMING THE VERACITY OF THE REPORTS OF THE INSTALLATION OF SURFACE-TO-AIR AND ANTI-SHIP CRUISE MISSILES ON KAGITINGAN REEF (FIERY CROSS), ZAMORA REEF (SUBI), AND PANGANIBAN REEF (MISCHIEF) IN THE SPRATLY ISLANDS CHAIN IN THE SOUTH CHINA SEA AND IF PROVEN TRUE CONDEMN IT IN THE STRONGEST POSSIBLE TERMS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-05-08
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON NATIONAL DEFENSE AND SECURITY ON 2018-05-30
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2018-05-21;
